name: StarGuy!
description:
I would have liked to add much more stuff to this thing, but considering that I have no time on the final day of the jam to add features, a rushed tutorial scene and a potentially even more rushed city scene with random boxes will have to do.

I only realized after adding the dash and airjump in that I basically copied Jett from Valorant, but eh it's probably fine.
Oh, and you can also click to drag around rigidbodies, I forgot to add any elements to signify that feature.

This thing is at least a lot more developed than my previous game for this jam.

Also the only way to exit is using Alt + f4 (sorry)
